attributes.action: cancel gcse and a level exams for 2021 for all students
attributes.additional_details: its just been a tough time for everyone especially for the youth and i think this will impact our lives for a while especialy with the new normaand they hould be given the justice of not sitting the exams this year as its not fair under all this problematic virus and ilnesses and deaths and also peoples own experiences of covid 19 that have severely had a detramental impact on their lives and lockdowns keeping people away from the education environment.
attributes.background: reconsider that students have had to face a tough time during this pandemic with face to face classes being cancelled and online platofrms and also the stress and extreme anxiety and exams will just pile on top of this pressure so PLEASE

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
